name: Legends of The Dragonlords: A Shadow's Tale
blurb: Legends of the Dragon Lords takes everything you love about an RPG and takes it to an all new level. And the key part is YOU!

rewards.reward: THANK YOU! Every dollar counts and you get your name in backer credits and exclusive access to backer only events.
Early Bird Special: A digital copy of LEGEND OF THE DRAGON LORDS: A SHADOW'S TALE and all previous non limited rewards.
A digital copy of LEGEND OF THE DRAGON LORDS: A SHADOW'S TALE and all previous non limited rewards.
Get a digital copy of the LEGEND OF THE DRAGON LORDS: A SHADOW'S TALE OST (Original Soundtrack) and all previous non limited rewards.
An exclusive backer only LEGEND OF THE DRAGON LORDS: A SHADOW'S TALE wallpaper and all previous non limited rewards.
A 18"x24" poster of THE LEGEND OF THE DRAGON LORDS: A SHADOW'S TALE.  Includes all previously mention non-limited rewards.
A LEGEND OF THE DRAGON LORDS: A SHADOW'S TALE T-shirt along with all previous non limited rewards.
A limited edition Legend of the Dragon Lords A Shadow's Tale Art book! (10"x 8" Including 20 pages of art and explanations behind the art process and how characters and locations came to be)

SPECIAL GEAR PACK!!! Get all previously mentioned limited items (including the T-shirt, poster, and art book)  Even if all are sold out we will special order one for you. Also includes all previously mentioned non-limited rewards.

Have a townsperson or city folk designed after you!  A person that resembles you in the game though most people might not know it's you, you can tell your friends that you're in a game! (Along with all non limited rewards)

Have a side character in the game be replaced by you!  The character of our choosing will be replaced with your name, a custom sprite based off your appearance, and bust art based off your appearance. (Along with all non limited rewards)

Create map and side story! (Along with all non limited rewards)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Work with the development team to create a map of your imagination with a side missions of your creation.

All backer designed maps and missions will be featured on an island off the main continent of the game and will be released to backers as exclusive content after the release of the game.

DREAMER STATUS!  Much like us over at Living Dream you too are a fellow dreamer and you want to see this dream world come true as much as we do.  For that we'd like to share our love for you by giving you a special designed hoodie that will never be sold to the public.  Each of the members of Living Dream will sign it (we live all across the world so each of those signatures is costly and will take time, we hope you understand) You will also receive a special thank you letter from myself, the President of Living Dream Entertainment.  (Includes  all non limited rewards as well as the limited T-shirt, signed poster, and signed art book)

Dragon Lord Status! You really like where we want to take this game and you want to be a part of it's creation.  So for that we will work with you to create a well developed character that will continue to play a role throughout the series beyond the first chapter.  This character will be included in future designs (Including but not limited to posters, wallpapers, T-shirts, and cell phone cases)  You will receive a one of a kind T-shirt and poster based around your character.                               -------------------------------------------------------------------------\r\n\r\nDifference between your character and previously mentioned custom characters is where as most custom characters are in game for a relatively brief period yours is more active in the main story line.  Your character will also be able to participate in battles with skills and animations as detailed as any other major character.  (Includes all previous non-limited rewards as well as a T-shirt, and signed copies of the poster and art book)

CO-DEVELOPER!  With your backing we're able to truly show what we want this game to be.  We will focus our efforts on creating a playable demo (which we will try to get out within a month of being successfully funded)  We'd like to show our appreciation to you by placing you as a member of the team as a co-developer. You will be listed in the games credits as such and if you would like we will add you to the website and the Kickstarter Page.  The president of Living Dream Entertainment would also like to personally thank you and treat you to dinner (excludes traveling expenses) upon the release of the demo where you two can discuss the future of the Legend of the Dragon Lords series! We would also like to thank you by naming a key character in the main story line after you!  (Includes all items in the special gear pack, all signed)
